radiographic_examinations.findings: Lung bases are clear, liver enhances homogeneously without focal lesions, gallbladder is unremarkable, pancreas does not demonstrate focal lesions, spleen is homogeneous and normal in size, a 6 mm hypodensity in the lower pole of the right kidney, small hiatal hernia, rim enhancing tubular structure in the right lower quadrant with appendicoliths, surrounding asymmetric fat stranding suggestive of microperforation, no evidence of acute diverticulitis, urinary bladder and terminal ureters are normal, uterus is enlarged with multiple fibroids, no blastic or lytic lesion suspicious for malignancy.
